purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for

UL.LI: a property that is possessed by an individual product or activity; and
a property that is a necessary conditions for membership of a class of product or activity.

LI.P: the identity of an independent property definition;

note.P: This is within the scope of the Independent_property_definition application module.

LI.P: the nature of property space for an independent property definition;

note.P: This is within the scope of the Property_space application module.

LI.P: the identification of an independent property definition by a number with respect to a scale;

note.P: This is within the scope of the Property_identification application module.

LI.P: the specification that an individual activity or product possesses a property;

note.P: This is within the scope of the Possession_of_property application module.

LI.P: the specification that each member of a class of activity or class of product possesses a property;

note.P: This is within the scope of the Property_condition application module.

LI.P: the nature of the object to which the property is assigned.

note.P: Individual product, class of product, individual activity and class of activity are within the scopes of the Product_as_individual, Class_of_product, Activity_as_individual, and Class_of_activity, application modules respectively.
